Text:
I'll tell you what: It's in Spanish. Not as in some parts in Argentinian Spanish, no, it's dubbed in Spaniard Spanish. 

Video is great, Sound is great. But it's not the original language.

El sonido y la imagen est치n bien. Pero no es el idioma original, no es que tenga partes en castellano argentino, es que est치 doblada entera al espa침ol de espa침a.
